title: Upload empty-state logo update + animation + PDF/UI overlap fixes

requirements.summary: Add a new transparent round red PATENTED logo image asset for Upload tab empty-state animation only
acceptanceCriteria: A new transparent-cutout logo file exists in frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filename specified in the Image Requirements section.
The asset has a transparent background (no solid rectangle behind the circular logo).
No other existing branding assets (header logo, PDF header logo, PDF watermark logo) are replaced or modified as part of adding this asset.

file_operations.description: Add the new static generated image asset (transparent background) for use only in the Upload tab empty-state animation.

requirements.summary: Update Upload tab empty-state to use the new PATENTED logo, centered and slightly smaller
acceptanceCriteria: When workbook is null, UploadTab renders the new logo image source (not /assets/generated/ptntd-cutout.dim_1200x1200.png).
The rendered logo appears centered and is visually smaller than the previous max-w-md presentation (e.g., reduced max width), while remaining clearly readable.
No changes are made to the app header logo sizing/branding as part of this requirement.

file_operations.description: Swap the empty-state image src to frontend/public/assets/generated/patented-round-red-cutout.dim_1200x1200.png and adjust layout sizing utilities so the centered logo renders slightly smaller than before, without touching header branding.

requirements.summary: Make Upload empty-state logo continuously rotate in one direction while preserving the flip effect, with motion-reduction support
acceptanceCriteria: The Upload empty-state logo has a continuous rotation animation that loops smoothly and does not use any alternating/reverse direction behavior.
The flip animation still occurs on the Upload empty-state logo (flip + rotation both visible, not mutually exclusive).
The rotation speed is slow/gentle (similar to the prior ‘slow flip’ expectation), and respects motion-reduction (animation disabled with prefers-reduced-motion).
PDF exports and Excel exports are unchanged (no animated assets or animation logic is introduced into export code paths).

file_operations.description: Add a CSS utility/class for the Upload empty-state logo that combines slow continuous rotation (single direction) with the existing flip effect, and disables animation under prefers-reduced-motion.
Apply the new combined flip+rotation class to the empty-state logo only (when workbook is null), ensuring the animation remains on-screen only and does not affect any export-related code paths.

requirements.summary: Fix PDF export layout to prevent any text overlap across header, footer, and table content for multi-page exports
acceptanceCriteria: Exported PDFs (from Results and History) have no overlapping text in the header, footer, or table area.
Long header/footer strings and long cell values are handled without overlapping (wrap and/or truncate as needed), and content stays within page margins.
Multi-page exports preserve the same header/footer spacing and do not overlap with the table content on any page.

file_operations.description: Update PDF rendering to wrap header/footer strings within page margins and to render table cells with wrapping-aware, dynamic row heights (including page-break calculations) so no text overlaps on any page.

requirements.summary: Fix in-app responsive layout/text wrapping to prevent visible UI text overlap while keeping all text in English
acceptanceCriteria: No visible text overlaps other UI elements in the main app layout at typical desktop widths and narrow/mobile widths (responsive).
Any adjustments preserve existing workflows and do not introduce new user-facing non-English text.

file_operations.description: Adjust header layout to be more responsive (e.g., allow wrapping/stacking of logo and action buttons at narrow widths) to prevent overlap without changing the header logo asset or branding.

Improve responsive table/card layouts to prevent text overlap by enabling safe wrapping/truncation in constrained areas (especially table headers/cells and top action rows) while keeping all visible text in English.
Improve responsive history card/tabs layout to prevent text overlap on smaller widths by adjusting spacing/wrapping/alignment (no workflow changes; English-only UI text).
